# IDataProvider.InvalidateColumnsCache method

Clears the column cache. Overriding classes must implement this.

```csharp
public void InvalidateColumnsCache(string repository)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| repository | Name of the repository to clear cache for. |
